statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -5 \\ -1 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ -1 \\ 7 \\ -7 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -19 \\ 17 \\ -11 \\ 29 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -5 \\ -1 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ -1 \\ 7 \\ -7 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -19 \\ 17 \\ -11 \\ 29 \end{array}\right] do not span \mathbb{R}^4.
